quote: As a writer, you can’t get to where you want to be, coming from the place you started, unless you have something extremely important you want to say to someone who really doesn’t want to know.
quote_letters: AS A WRITER YOU CANT GET TO WHERE YOU WANT TO BE COMING FROM THE PLACE YOU STARTED UNLESS YOU HAVE SOMETHING EXTREMELY IMPORTANT YOU WANT TO SAY TO SOMEONE WHO REALLY DOESNT WANT TO KNOW
